discussion.content:
B. MSRA
Microsoft Remote Assistance (MSRA) is specifically designed for remote troubleshooting. It allows a technician to connect to a user's computer remotely, view their screen, and control their mouse and keyboard. This enables the technician to diagnose and resolve issues without the need for physical access to the computer.

While Screen Share, Virtual Network Computing (VNC), and Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) can also be used for remote access, MSRA is specifically tailored for remote troubleshooting and provides additional features like file transfer and chat.

Google Gemini

Selected Answer: B
MSRA--- Remote assistance comes in handy while educating or assisting an end user.
RDP----Remote desktop is for unattended access.

questions.question_text: A technician needs to troubleshoot a user's computer while the user is connected to the system. The technician must also connect to the user's system using remote access tools built in to Windows. Which of the following is the best option to troubleshoot the user's computer?
A project manager reports severely degraded OS performance after the installation of a recent system patch. Which of the following should the technician most likely do to correct the issue?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Uninstall security update
Here's why:

 Uninstall security update: If the system performance degradation occurred right after installing a specific patch, the most likely cause is that the patch itself introduced an issue. In this case, uninstalling the security update will remove the problematic patch and restore the system to its previous state, which may resolve the performance issues.

Selected Answer: B
Not sure why it says security update when it says system patch. I am going with B

Selected Answer: D
D. Device data encryption
Here's why:

 Device data encryption: Encrypting the data on the mobile device ensures that the information is protected and cannot be accessed without the proper decryption key or password, even if the device is lost or stolen. This is crucial for safeguarding proprietary or sensitive information, especially when the device is offline and cannot be remotely wiped or tracked.

questions.question_text: Which of the following ensures proprietary information on a lost or stolen mobile device cannot be accessed while the device is offline?

Due to special job responsibilities, an end user needs the ability to edit the properties of Windows system files. The user has already been granted local administrator privileges. Which of the following Control Panel utilities should be used to provide easy access to the files?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
It is File explorer, through which we can show & hide files.

questions.question_text: A user with a disability needs to be able to press the Ctrl+Alt+Del keyboard sequence one key at a time. Which of the following turns on this Ease ofAccess feature?

choices.A: Press the Shift key five times in a row
